Title: Cold Feet
Description:
If Marithos and Amythora want to run off and play adventurer, that's their choice. I have a sense of loyalty.

<Despite his bold words, the messenger looks uncertain.>

You don't know what Sarkareth is capable of, all right?

Look through my things and draw whatever conclusions you'd like. But I won't tell you anything. I can't.
ObjectivesText: Examine the apprehended dracthyr's belongings for clues about the Sundered Flame.

Objectives.Text: Bag of Sundered Flame Contraband Examined
